custom_css: .tag-list {display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 10px; padding: 0; margin: 0;}

.tag-btn {display: inline-block; padding: 6px 14px; background-color: #800020; /* ÈÖíÁ∫¢Ëâ≤ */ color: #fff; border-radius: 20px; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: none; transition: background-color 0.3s ease;}

settings.custom_liquid:
{% if template == 'article' %}

Share this article:

{% endif %}

custom_css: .social-share-list {display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 12px; padding: 0; margin: 0;}

.social-btn {display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; padding: 10px 14px; font-size: 14px; border-radius: 4px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; background-color: #8b0000; /* ÈÖíÁ∫¢Ëâ≤ */ transition: background 0.3s ease; flex-shrink: 0;}
section_DkDQ6n.name: t:names.custom_section

custom_css: .recent-article-list {display: flex; gap: 24px; overflow-x: auto; scroll-snap-type: x mandatory; padding-bottom: 12px;}

.recent-post-card {flex: 0 0 340px; /* Âä†ÂÆΩÂç°Áâá‰ª•ÈÄÇÈÖçÂ§ßÂõæ */ display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 10px; border: 1px solid #eee; border-radius: 10px; padding: 12px; scroll-snap-align: start; background-color: #fff; transition: transform 0.25s ease;}
